transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir, good evening. Main Ankita baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART team se.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Sir, main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu Ankita. I hope abhi baat ho sakti hai aapse?
Customer: Nahi, abhi main office mein hu. Abhi nahi baat ho sakti. Kis regarding?
Executive: Sir, aapka ek feedback IndiaMART par receive hua tha jisme aapne ye express kiya tha ki aap not satisfied hai services ko lekar. Issi regarding baat karni thi ki kya pareshani aa rahi hai?
Customer: Pareshani to lead hi nahi aa rahi hai to kya pareshani hai? Wo to baat karne se baat nahi hai.
Executive: Sir, aapki pareshani ka solution... solution to kuch nahi milta hai.
Executive: Solution ke regarding hi call kiya hai sir. Solution ke regarding hi call kiya hai. Aap thoda agar samay de sakte hai abhi discussion ka?
Customer: Wo to discussion to bahut baar logo se discussion ho gaya. Usse kuch fruitful discussion to hota nahi hai. Usme outcome bhi kuch nahi aata hai.
Customer: Outcome to zero hai usme se.
Executive: Hello. Sir, aapka actual concern kya hai thoda sa express karenge jaise aapke paas leads bhi aa rahi hai. Quality buyer ki aayi hai.
Customer: Lead hi... ha suno, suno. Mere paas jo lead aa rahi hai wo lead aisi aa rahi hai ki mere jo brand name se mangte hai. Brand name abhi mera naya hai to main brand name se us brand ka kaise supply kar sakta hu? Wo bolta hai ki mujhe wahi brand ka chahiye.
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: Barabar? Ek ho gaya ye.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan, haan boliye sir, aage boliye.
Customer: Haan, to jis brand ka unhone ye kar diya hai requirement dala hai usi brand ka mangte hai. To main kaise de sakta hu usi brand ka? Main convince bhi kaise kar sakta hu? Wo bolte hai ki mujhe wahi brand chahiye.
Customer: Ek ho gaya ye. Dusra ho gaya ki mujhe ek ye chahiye call kar diya to wo bolte hai ki humne kaha inquiry ki hi nahi hai. Phone rakh ek to phone rakh dete hai ya bolte hai ki maine aise hi dekha tha hamari to kuch requirement hai hi nahi hai.
Customer: Ye ho gaya second.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Third ho, third ho gaya ki mere paas wholesale ka hai ya mujhe bulk mein lead chahiye. Mujhe lead aati hai aise retail mein.
Customer: Barabar?
Executive: Haan, to ye, ye concern to ye solve hi nahi hote na. Main to chhe mahine to mere aise discussion mein nikal gaye hai.
Executive: Sir, hum one by one solution pe aate hai. First of all aapne bola ki aapka brand jo market mein abhi new hai, right? To kahi na kahi aapka brand ki lead nahi aa rahi hai aapke paas par dusre brand ki lead aa rahi hai, right?
Customer: Sir, mera brand market, suno, mera brand market mein gaya hi nahi hai to mera brand kaise mangenge log?
Executive: Right, right. Aur dusre brand ki lead aa rahi hai ye aapka concern hai. Sir dekhiye, first of all IndiaMART...
Customer: Dusre brand ki lead aa rahi hai, suno. Dusre brand ki lead aa rahi hai to wo wahi brand mang rahe hai. Udhar wo bolte hai ki hume dusra brand nahi chahiye.
Executive: Samajh pa rahi hu sir.
Executive: Sir dekhiye, pehli baat ki IndiaMART kisi bhi XYZ brand ko promote nahi karta hai. Hum kisi bhi particular brand ko promote karne ke liye nahi matlab usko ye karte hai. But buyer ka ek apna choice hai ki usko kis brand ke lead chahiye. Aur sir aapka jab registration bhi IndiaMART pe hua tha to humne kabhi brand specific koi humne commitment nahi kari hogi, right? To aapko apne brand ko ke liye unko suggestion dena padega aur convince karna padega.
Customer: Ye batao ki kaise dena hai wo?
Executive: Kya kehna chah rahe hai?
Customer: Dena kaise hai wo to batao na ki mera brand naya hai.
Executive: Main ye bata rahi hu sir. Haan.
Executive: Main ye bata rahi hu sir dekhiye jaise ki aapka brand ka jo product hai jo dusre brand ke product ko wo mang rahe hai. Kahi na kahi aapka agar usme price ka difference hai to aap bata sakte hai ki aapki brand ki product hai.
Customer: Suno, price tak to baat hi nahi hoti hai. Wo bolte hai ki hume wo dusra brand chahiye hi nahi hai. Price ki to baat hi nahi hoti hai.
Executive: Sir, convince karne ke liye to aap yahi saari cheeze bata sakte hai na ki aapki company ka product price effective hai.
Customer: Barabar hai, lekin wo sune to na.
Executive: Iske alawa sir jaise IndiaMART pe...
Customer: Haan, sir wo to hai hi.
Executive: Iske alawa IndiaMART ki rating bhi five hai to aap ye bhi bata sakte hai ki aapki five rating profile hai.
Customer: Are lekin wo sunega tabhi na. Wo seedha bol dete hai ki mujhe wahi brand chahiye phone rakh dete hai. Kya karenge? Kisko sunayenge?
Executive: Achha sir, maan lijiye aapke shop pe koi buyer aata hai wo kahega ki usko ek specific brand ka product chahiye to waha par to aap convince hi kar rahe hote hai na. Is hisab se to aapka product kabhi market mein aayega hi nahi.
Customer: Are lekin wo counter pe khada hota hai. Suno, wo to counter pe khada hota hai na to usko convince kar sakte hai. Ab ye phone rakh diya to kisko convince karu?
Executive: Sir dekho brand ko agar IndiaMART pe aapne register kiya hai to aapko...
Customer: Nahi, wo ekdam, ekdam useless hai. Bas baki itna hi bol sakta hu main.
Customer: Mere 28,000 pani mein gaye.
Executive: Achha, sir.
Customer: Pani mein gaye mere 28, 28,000 maine pay kar diye the. Abhi us din phone aaya tha unhone bola ki aap aur paisa dal do to aapko waise lead aayegi, bulk wali lead aayegi nahi to abhi aise hi retail wale aayegi. Matlab kya ho gaya?
Executive: Nahi nahi, unhone aapko ye suggest kiya tha sir ki agar aap premium services mein jana chah rahe hai listing apni increase...
Customer: Premium services mein jaunga dekho mujhe pehle isme satisfied hu to dusre isme jaunga na main. Abhi pehle isme hi main satisfied nahi hu to aage mein jaane ka matlab nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi, hum aapko bilkul force nahi kar rahe ki aap dusra package le and aur invest kare. Jab tak aap is service se satisfied nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi karenge bhi nahi hai. Hum aapne invest kar diya to bhi karenge nahi hai.
Executive: Alright sir, alright. Uske liye koi issue nahi hai. Sir jaise agar aapke paas koi buyer aa raha hai aur usne requirement dali hai. Aisa to nahi hai sir ki 50% buyer aapko kahe, baat to karte hi honge. 100% buyer to deny nahi karte honge na registration ke liye.
Customer: Call, main wahi to bol raha hu na. Call uthayega uthane ke baad wo bol dete hai ki hume wo dusra brand nahi chahiye, wahi brand chahiye.
Executive: Achha, ye to aap buyer uski baat kar rahe hai jis buyer ko aap call kar rahe hai. Kai saare buyers IndiaMART pe aapka profile dekh kar wo khud bhi aapko call kar rahe hai direct samne se.
Customer: Nahi, ek bhi nahi aaya. Abhi tak ek bhi nahi aaya.
Executive: Abhi tak ek bhi nahi aaya waise?
Customer: Na.
Executive: Sir September mein aapko total chhe buyer ki call aayi thi. Aapne to buyer ki call chhe mein se paanch receive hi nahi kiye the. Iske reason se aapko call abhi nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi, wo to, wo to South wala banda tha. Usko call back karke baat bhi ki to usne bola ki ye nahi chahiye.
Executive: Sir, buyer ki call jab aap receive karenge tab to pata hoga na ki buyer kis regarding se hai.
Customer: Suno, main paanch baar ek bande ne call kiya hai. Aap dekh lo mera history track record dekh lo pura.
Executive: Ek minute sir, aap call pe hi rahiye.
Customer: Aap track record dekh lo aur baad mein mujhe call kar dena. Abhi mat karna.
Executive: Nahi, sir main ye aapko kehna chah rahi hu...
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To aapse kab baat ho sakti hai? Aap bataiye aap jis time pe available rahenge main usi time pe connect karungi. Koi aisa nahi hai ki abhi mujhe.
Customer: Suno, aap logo se na baat karna hi ye hai. Baat karne ka matlab nahi mere 28,000 pani mein gaye hai.
Executive: Sir, har ek naye brand IndiaMART pe register hote hai.
Customer: Suno, suno, suno main clearly batata hu ki tumhare IndiaMART wale log hi sense wale bolte hai ki isme one to two percent success rate hai.
Executive: Ye kisne bola hai sir?
Customer: To kisne bola main naam nahi bataunga kiska.
Executive: Nahi, aisa bilkul nahi hai sir dekhiye koi bhi naya brand aata hai to wo B2B platform pe hi register hota hai na.
Customer: Aage baat nahi karni hai phone rakh dena.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting enough leads.

- Leads are for other brands.

- Buyers insist on specific brands.

- Some buyers deny making inquiries.

- Leads are retail, wants wholesale.



Resolution:

- Executive explained IndiaMART doesn't promote specific brands.

- Suggested ways to convince buyers about his brand.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, brand, subscription, refund, convince
